name: Escape
wikiSummary: Escape,being the 6th track on the Ride the Lightning Album,is about having the freedom to live as you choose not how society or those around you want you to live,and not being told what is right and what is wrong.The siren at the end of the song is put there to emphasize the escape.
wikiText:
Escape,being the 6th track on the Ride the Lightning Album,is about having the freedom to live as you choose not how society or those around you want you to live,and not being told what is right and what is wrong.The siren at the end of the song is put there to emphasize the escape.
